alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Bleckley; Crawford; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach; Pulaski; Taylor; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Macon, northwestern Dodge, southern Bibb, Pulaski, southwestern Twiggs, northeastern Dooly, southwestern Bleckley, Peach, Houston, Crawford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Roberta to near Hawkinsville, and moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Perry, Fort Valley, Cochran, Hawkinsville, Roberta, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Unadilla, Marshallville, Reynolds, Robins Air Force Base, Hayneville, Houston Lake, Mobley Crossing, Mock Springs, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Moss Oak and Skipperton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Bleckley; Crawford; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach; Pulaski; Taylor; Twiggs
